alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 5:13PM CDT until June 11 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Callahan County in west central Texas... Southeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Southwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Northeastern Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Buffalo Gap, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dyess Afb around 520 PM CDT. Wylie and Tye around 525 PM CDT. Potosi and Dudley around 540 PM CDT. Hawley around 545 PM CDT. Eula around 550 PM CDT. Hamby around 555 PM CDT. Abilene and Clyde around 600 PM CDT. Nugent around 605 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 276 and 310. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
